EmailTemplate.name: 09_INFORMATION REQUEST_Request additional Information from Contact/Lead-ROMANIAN
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont Privacy request - Additional info
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Stimate Partener,
Vă mulțumim că ați contactat ting DuPont.
Unfortunately, we cannot proceed with the processing of your privacy request due to the fact that you have provided insufficient information for use to proceed with your request.
Please complete the privacy request form with all the necessary information requested. We will thereafter proceed with the processing of your request.
Așteptăm cu nerăbdare răspunsul dumneavoastră.
DuPont Inquiry Management Center
Toll-free number : 00800 3876 68 38
Phone : 0034 985 12 37
Fax : 0034 912 72 52 37
E-mail: eu-info@dupont.com
